member.name: T:Microsoft.Recognizers.Text.Number.Chinese.ChineseNumberExtractorMode
member.summary: These modes only apply to ChineseNumberExtractor. The default more urilizes an allow list to avoid extracting numbers in ambiguous/undesired combinations of Chinese ideograms. ExtractAll mode is to be used in cases where extraction should be more aggressive (e.g. in Units extraction).

member.name: F:Microsoft.Recognizers.Text.Number.Chinese.ChineseNumberExtractorMode.Default
member.summary: Number extraction with an allow list that filters what numbers to extract.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Recognizers.Text.Number.BasePercentageExtractor.Extract(System.String)
member.summary: extractor the percentage entities from the sentence.
member.returns: List of percentage entities from the sentence source.

member.summary: replace the @sys.num to the real patterns, directly modifies the ExtractResult.
member.param: the sentence after replacing the @sys.num, Example: @sys.num %.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Recognizers.Text.Number.BasePercentageExtractor.PreprocessStrWithNumberExtracted(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.Int32,System.Int32}@,System.Collections.Generic.IList{Microsoft.Recognizers.Text.ExtractResult}@)
member.summary: get the number extractor results and convert the extracted numbers to @sys.num, so that the regexes can work.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Recognizers.Text.Number.Japanese.JapaneseNumberExtractorMode.Default
member.summary: Number extraction with an allow list that filters what numbers to extract.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Recognizers.Text.Number.Korean.KoreanNumberExtractorMode
member.summary: These modes can be applied to KoreanNumberExtractor. The default more urilizes an allow list to avoid extracting numbers in ambiguous/undesired combinations of Korean ideograms. --> such as "십이지장(十二指腸)" is organ name(duodenum, part of small intestine) in Korean, should not be extracted. ExtractAll mode is to be used in cases where extraction should be more aggressive (e.g. in Units extraction).

member.name: F:Microsoft.Recognizers.Text.Number.Korean.KoreanNumberExtractorMode.Default
member.summary: Number extraction with an allow list that filters what numbers to extract.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Recognizers.Text.Number.NumberMode.PureNumber
member.summary: Don't extract number from cases like 16ml

member.name: M:Microsoft.Recognizers.Text.Number.BaseNumberParser.DigitNumberParse(Microsoft.Recognizers.Text.ExtractResult)
member.summary: Precondition: ExtResult must have arabic numerals.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Recognizers.Text.Number.INumberParserConfiguration.NormalizeTokenSet(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},Microsoft.Recognizers.Text.ParseResult)
member.summary: Used when requiring to normalize a token to a valid expression supported by the ImmutableDictionaries (language dictionaries).

member.name: M:Microsoft.Recognizers.Text.Number.INumberParserConfiguration.ResolveCompositeNumber(System.String)
member.summary: Used when requiring to convert a string to a valid number supported by the language.
